mapper.insert: insert into cafehi_cart (cart_code, member_id, menu_code, amount) values (seq_cart.nextval, #{member_id}, #{menu_code}, #{amount})
mapper.select:
SELECT cart_code, p.menu_code, m.member_id, member_name, menu_name, amount, menu_price, (menu_price*amount) money
FROM cafehi_member m, cafehi_cart c, cafehi_menu p
WHERE m.member_id = c.member_id and c.menu_code = p.menu_code and c.member_id=#{member_id} ORDER BY cart_code
